name: Post Apocalyptic Revival
description:
Description

In 2130 AD Humans establish a Titan Station called Project ark in the Johovian System which is controlled entirely by robots. The goal of the project is to store all the DNA of extinct and living life. 10 years during the projects runtime the moon loses contact with the earth. When the connection from the earth satellites comes back, all life on earth is discovered to be dead.

Your mission is to restore earth back to its original form, but your DNA storage unit is broken. The only thing that harbours the elements for life is your assistants lab grown sandwich, you take the sandwich put it in the elemental scanner and artificially evolve life from square one in a virtual simulation. The goal is to get all the lost DNA back and restore earth back to normal.

How to play the game

Select two creatures and drag it in one of the top or bottom slot.

You can access the creatures by selecting an era, then a group, two buttons, you can also combine different creatures with different era and group if possible.

Once you have two creatures in bottom and top slot, you press the green button to combine, and the red button to put all items back into the inventory.

Report Bugs

If you want to contribute and help us find bugs, please go to this link:

https://github.com/ThomasAunvik/PostApocalypticRevival-BugReport

You can post out suggestions too, and we will see what we can do to improve the game.
